description:
Awaiting the North Star Army is a general of the Celestial Emperor Army, the strongest practitioner of the Imperial Fist of the Source Star, Golden Falco. He singlehandedly routs the entire North Star Army. In exchange for sparing all of their lives, he demands the death of their leader. Bat tries to protect Lin by claiming he is their leader, but Falco sees right through it and identifies Lin as the true leader. What is the tie that binds Falco and Lin!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`empereur est fou de rage : « Falco, extermine le Hokuto ! »
Rage of the Celestial Emperor! Falco, Obliterate the North Star from Earth!!
Tentei Ikaru! Falco, Hokuto o Chijou Yori Nedayashi ni Seyo!!
天帝怒る! ファルコ, 北斗を地上より根絶やしにせよ!
